author: Justin Chan
comment: Suddenly unable to save videos after the update. The prompt saying it has downloaded the video appears fine but the video is nowhere to be found in gallery.

author: Brenden Morris
comment: UPDATE: when I press the RT Button on a tweet that I already RT'd (that's on my user profile), it gives me a 403 Bad  Request for API Twitter Limits. So me pressing the RT Button a second time to "delete" that RT from my profile does not work. I'm steaming my tweets via Mobile Data. So I'm not pulling to refresh for Twitter Limits so I'm not sure why it's giving me that Bad Request 403.   Anyway ReTweeted Tweet on my profile? I tap the 3 dots on the tweet that I re-tweeted and there's no way to Delete that tweet on my profile.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Unless you retweeted it in the app directly we have no way of knowing you retweeted it in the app from your home timeline, However you can see it and delete it from your _own_ timeline as that'll be loaded in real time and show that you retweeted it

author: Ric Roman
comment: Compose issue

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Not sure I understand the problem

comment: I love this app and all its features.  The iOS app didn't work for me but the android version is better than Flamingo or Talon. Live notifications sets it above the rest.

author: orson
comment: If u could give a half star I would, when you block someone you still see any post they send to you, also deleting tweets not working either, so yeah, is garbage, how's that for constructive criticism?!delete my own tweet?? So you're app doesn't work if you want to block someone unless I delete mine? Bravo! Like I said is just 💩

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: When you block someone. All tweets on the time line are immediately deleted. They aren’t from DMs intentionally but you can just delete the thread. To delete a tweet you just go to your own tweet and select delete. They do indeed delete. No you do not need to delete your own tweets. Blocking someone immediately removes their tweets

author: John from Woodside Apps
comment: This is the only podcast manager i use. It is constantly being updated and new features added. I can recommend it for both Android and IOS.
Infuriating bugs.  Update 2/1/2018: Developer asked what the bugs are. When I told him in the past, he has either not responded, or said they don't happen to him.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: I'm afraid that doesn't help me see what bugs you're referring to

comment: The best client for Twitter. Lots of features, true push, fast and clean. Great price for what you get. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

author: Vardhaman Shetty
comment: Continuous updation is worth the price paid.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Glad you like it

author: jeff cheshier
comment: For some stupid reason Twitter stopped working on my phone. Found Tweetings and it's working perfectly so far. Happy to find it.

author: C. Jay Conrod
comment: Tried using the Twitterstorm feature and it just posted multiple copies of the last tweet in the Twitterstorm.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: It posts each one in turn. I’ve not seen or heard of it doing that. Please try again

author: Isabel Chan
comment: I can't view videos or more than one picture attached to a tweet with the app. I end up having to open the tweet in a browser. It's been my go to app for the longest time and I hope this gets resolved soon!  Reply to dev: yes, i know, but that function isn't working for me when it used to with no problems. i haven't touched my settings, i've only updated my app.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Just swipe left or right on a Tweet with multiple photos

author: ʆiz Tarducci
comment: I love this app however I have a stupid question...how do you log out? 😁

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: If you go to the navigation drawer. Expand the accounts and long press the one you want to delete

author: Tanya M
comment: Used to be good. Now, I've discovered, it's the reason I slowly stopped using Twitter. It's the small things that are annoying - username auto-complete won't work, sending a new DM requires you to know the person's Twitter handle coz it won't bring up suggestions as you type it in, and so on..

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: When you start a new DM it does indeed show suggestions on the user's, alternatively go to their profile and hit the DM button

author: Karen
comment: Used to be the best Twitter client. Current android version keeps freezing and crashing. Basically unusable.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Please try reinstalling

author: Arlon Morrison
comment: Can no longer share a tweet to other apps such as Telegram

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: please try reinstalling. We have no reported crash logs to indicate any form of issue with the latest version

author: Victor !
comment: Best Twitter Client. Fast with lot of features,  perfect for Twitter addicts.

author: ceaser williams
comment: It's a dope app, the only one I've ever paid for

author: Ruthie Rayne Clark
comment: An amazing, always improving Twitter client with one of the most responsive and helpful devs.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Glad you like it and glad to be of help

author: Anthony C
comment: Ok, I had to uninstall and reinstall the app. I am able to see multiple pics now. Unfortunately, I'm slowly getting my personal settings back. Rating back to 3★.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: please reach out to us on Twitter with an example tweet with this problem as the app most certainly shows all images attached to a tweet out of the box

comment: Keeps crashing on timeline loading. Getting fed up. Going back to Twitpane. Dev does have reports of crashing - just read the reviews mate! Sent logs twice and dev does nothing

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Please make sure you’re running the current version the latest update has zero submitted crash logs so I suspect you’re on an older version. I do read the reviews. I’d reinstall if I weee you. With no submitted crash logs then something is crashing before it gets to the app

author: Jessica Cantlope
comment: Slow, but usable! The only Twitter client I've tried with both lots of options and true multi-account support up front. I wish the settings were searchable, the loading indicators were better, and that likes/RTs weren't so slow (and inaccurate -- they won't always reflect the current interaction status, occasionally also preventing you from canceling retweets). That + how slow it is to load reply threads and handling of gifs/videos have caused me to switch recently. If they haven't been fixed by now, they probably never will be.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content:
Pull down only doesn't work if the timeline is already in the process of refreshing. 

We had an insane amount of requests to always show video controls so it was added. YouTube functionality is unchanged in literally years

author: Walid Bizri
comment: I bought this app to solely use it on my Android Wear smartwatch.  Unfortunately, every time I go through  the time line, it crashes. Therefore, I'm requesting a refund. I'll check back in a few months to see if this has been fixed.

author: Alair Abernethy
comment: The best Android Twitter client.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Glad you like it

author: Wulf
comment: This app is great! At long last I can browse my TL w/o that infuriating auto refresh. However, trouble viewing profiles from Activity pane. Comments, fixes?

author: Anthony Lloyd
comment: Recently upgraded to Oreo and keep getting a notification sound everytime I open my timeline or app. Other than that it's still the best Twitter app with lots of support.   P.s. can we get an option to remove the permanent stream notification in Oreo
why my push notification didn't delivered? but when i use test send via setting it's no problem. i already make tweetings auto start and whitelist all app activity.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Use the push status option which will show your registration status on the servers.  If that reports all is sending fine, there will be something in the Android settings blocking the notifications from being shown

author: Erno Leers
comment: Good app but too many updates. Feels like they leave testing to the public...

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Too many updates, you’d prefer us to leave bugs we’ve discovered, some long standing unfixed because you don’t want an update. Or delivering twitters new tweet sizes just because we delivered an app a few days ago. You don’t have to install every version if you don’t want to. We believe in agile development, ship early and ship often

author: Jeremy Moses
comment: This app is fantastic. I moved all of my Twitter activity (I run, or assist on, four accounts) to this app when the devs of another app I used suddenly quit responding to help requests for an extended period. By contrast, I just had a problem with the app at the unholy hour of 2:45am -- and by 2:54am I had a response saying to try reinstalling. The reinstall worked. The devs do care about their app and are quick to implement fixes to issues that are more complex (like the recent time when searching for an entity's Twitter name ended up crashing the app -- a fix was deployed within hours). Also, ability to edit tweets is a huge win. Overall, I have no qualms about recommending this app to anyone looking to manage one or multiple Twitter feeds.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Glad you like it

author: Imam Khoirur Rozaq
comment: i need to clear timelines data to avoiding gaps while refreshing, everytime some tweets just missing in the middle of the timeline

author: Drew Green
comment: The best! Don't bother with other twitter clients. This is awesome! Developer is quick at replying to my dumb questions as well!

author: Mark Pollini
comment: I love this twitter client. Transparent status and nav bar are awesome. I just wish it was compatible with Omni ROMs implementation of the tinted status/nav bar. It just turns it white when the transparent option isn't used.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: You can set the colour of the navigation bar through the theme settings. I don't know if the Omni ROM supports that feature though

author: Mohamad Al Karbi
comment: Great one with best functionality & options. I love its lists features; very helpful especially with hiding retweets. HOWEVER, list timeline position is freezing at the same old position whenever I open back the app.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Turn off links generated in the background in advanced settings

author: John Mc
comment: How do I get rid of the damn activity panes both portrait & landscape on my tablet, I've deselected yet they are still there

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Restart the app. By default it’s only configured for landscape not portrait unless you enable it from settings

author: Matthew Hale
comment: I love this twitter app and I've tried most of them. But theres a major annoying bug. Open official twitter app and click see more, tries to open this app.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Erm tap favorites on the tweet view

author: cutie juney
comment: Used for 1 day, The app didn't show group DM and delayed noti.

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Unfortunately group dms are impossible as it’s not supported by the twitter api

author: qkiril
comment: 現時点で最高のtwitterクライアントと言って差し支えないと思います。 Greatest twitter app.

author: Wayne Williams
comment: I'm using this on Android and BlackBerry OS 10 with no problems at all. I really like this Twitter client.

author: Tony Petersen
comment: Works well, nicely designed. I use this app primarily for the timeline widget which is also decent, but would recommend an alternative solution due to poor performance of widget.

author: Horza Gobuchul
comment: Not always displaying images or only displaying the first image. Is there a report button somewhere in the app?

reply.author: RBD Solutions Limited
reply.content: Sorry I don’t understand the issue. For support you should reach out on Twitter rather than reviews as we can’t assist from here
